welcome_message_hello: Hello! I am a collective of Haystack.One Sentient Bots (you can call me HOBS).
welcome_message_check_out: Check out what I am about.
bot_command_failsafe_wish: I wish that was a command! Try again.
welcome_message_people_check: You can check out people theme over here!
welcome_message_legal_check: You can check out legal theme over here!
welcome_message_wealth_check: You can check out wealth theme over here!
welcome_message_platform: I am a platform that helps you achieve [trusted curation using the wisdom of your networks](%s)
welcome_message_platform_revamp: I am a humanised deep learning [platform to achieve personalization at scale](%s)
welcome_message_reinvent: I am not trying to reinvent the wheel, just rearranging technology in a form people understand.
welcome_message_relevant_actionable: I can help you experience recent and relevant content that is actionable
welcome_message_know_themes: Do you want to know more about the themes I can provide?
welcome_message_all_themes: You can check out all themes over here!
welcome_message_know_more: Do you want to know more about Haystack.One?
welcome_message_all_more: You can check out more over here!
welcome_message_platform_know: You can know more about platform over here!
welcome_message_focus_industries_know: You can know more about our focus industries over here!
common_message_failsafe: I do not know how to respond to that message yet.
common_message_failsafe_help: If you are lost, do not worry. Just shout out !help
common_message_failsafe_learning: But I am constantly learning as we speak.
common_message_failsafe_check_out: Check out what I am about.
common_message_prompt_link_account: You have to link your account to talk more with me.
help_message_narrate_solace: It seems like you need help. Let us get you on track.
help_message_narrate_solace_prompt: I support a rather limited set of actions.
help_message_narrate_solace_unlink: If you really want to unlink me, just say !unlink haystack
connect_command_respond_not_linked: It appears that you are not linked yet. Visit Haystack.One to link to this channel.
connect_command_respond_unsupported: This channel is not yet supported.
connect_command_respond_unable_to_connec: Unable to connect. You can try adding at Haystack.One
connect_command_now_connected: You are now connected with %s at Haystack.One
link_command_unable_to_link: Unable to complete linking. Make sure you copied the right OTP link phrase and it is not expired.
link_command_respond_unsupported: This channel is not yet supported.
unlink_command_respond_not_linked: It appears that you are not linked yet. Visit Haystack.One to link to this channel.
unlink_command_unable_to_comply: Unable to complete unlinking. If issue persists, you can remove HOBS from your contact list.
common_provider_respond_unsupported: This channel is not yet supported.
link_provider_established: Link has been established successfully. You will now receive notifications on this channel.
unlink_provider_parting_sad: I am sad to see you leave! Your account is now unlinked with Haystack.One
unlink_provider_parting_unable: I am unable to unlink your account at the moment! You can attempt this again through Haystack.One > My profile > Conversation channels
contact_add_welcome_return_message: Welcome back! You can continue receiving notifications now.
common_notification_provider_pov_prompt_: {name} is following up on an {type} titled {title} that was shared with you. Visit {share-link} to respond/share.
common_notification_provider_pov_recomme: {name} has referred you for {type} titled {title}; Visit {apply-link} to respond/share.
common_notification_provider_pov_show_di: {name} does not have interest in your {type} titled {title}; Visit {prospect-link} to check-out the response and know more.
common_notification_provider_pov_show_in: {name} has showcased interest in your {type} titled {title}; Visit {prospect-link} to check-out the response and know more.
common_notification_provider_pov_questio: You did not answer the assessment questionnaire associated with {type} titled {title}; Visit {followup-link} to respond.
common_notification_provider_license_app: Your license has been approved; navigate to My Profile -> License Management and click refresh to create cards.
common_notification_provider_license_rej: Your license has been rejected; we shall reach out and explain the reasons for rejection.
common_notification_provider_corporate_w: {name} has added you as a partner/customer in Haystack.One; use link {signinlink} to sign in.
common_notification_provider_initial_goo: We noticed that you haven't earned goodies this week; earn by creating, sharing or responding in Haystack.One. Your total goodies are {total}.
common_notification_provider_earned_good: Happy to let you know that you earned {difference} goodies this week; your total goodies are {total}. Continue using Haystack.One and earn more goodies.
common_notification_provider_missed_good: We noticed that you haven't earned goodies this week; earn by creating, sharing or responding in Haystack.One. Your total goodies are {total}.
common_notification_provider_benefactor_: Thanks for the card share, will check it. Would be great to stay in touch with you. Would you like to connect on Haystack.One? - {benefactorname}
common_notification_provider_remove_all_: {firstName} has detached you from all groups. Thanks for your contribution.
common_notification_provider_import_fail: User import has failed partially due to multiple reasons, import the file once again.
Users import has failed due to multiple reasons, import the file once again.
common_notification_provider_import_succ: Users have been successfully imported; check your network to proceed.
common_notification_provider_user_connec: Would be great to stay in touch. Would you like to connect on Haystack.One? - {invitername}. Visit {connect-link} to connect.
